briefdescription.para: Proxy type.

briefdescription.para: Indexed triangle type.

memberdef.definition: CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::Variational_shape_approximation
memberdef.name: Variational_shape_approximation

briefdescription.para: initializes internal data for the approximation.

parameterdescription.para: CGAL TriangleMesh on which approximation operates
vertex point map of the mesh

memberdef.definition: std::size_t CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::initialize_seeds
memberdef.name: initialize_seeds

briefdescription.para: initializes the seeds with both maximum number of proxies and minimum error drop stop criteria.

detaileddescription.para:
The first criterion met stops the seeding. Parameters out of range are ignored. NamedParameters a sequence of Named Parameters np an optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below number of proxies initialized Seeding Named Parameters
the selection of seeding method Type: CGAL::Surface_mesh_approximation::Seeding_method Default: CGAL::Surface_mesh_approximation::HIERARCHICAL
the maximum number of proxies used to approximate the input mesh Type: std::size_t Default: num_faces(tm) / 3, used when min_error_drop is also not provided
the minimum error drop of the approximation, expressed as the ratio between two iterations of proxy addition Type: geom_traits::FT Default: 0.1, used when max_number_of_proxies is also not provided
the number of relaxation iterations interleaved within seeding Type: std::size_t Default: 5

memberdef.definition: FT CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::run
memberdef.name: run

briefdescription.para: runs the partitioning and fitting processes on the whole surface.

simplesect.para: total fitting error

memberdef.definition: bool CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::run_to_convergence
memberdef.argsstring: (const FT cvg_threshold, const std::size_t max_iterations=100, std::size_t avg_interval=3)
memberdef.name: run_to_convergence

briefdescription.para: calls run while error decrease is greater than cvg_threshold.

parameterdescription.para: the percentage of error change between two successive runs, should be in range (0, 1).
size of error average interval to have smoother convergence curve, if 0 is assigned, 1 is used instead.

simplesect.para: true if converged before hitting the maximum iterations.

memberdef.definition: FT CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::compute_total_error
memberdef.name: compute_total_error

briefdescription.para: computes fitting error of current partition to the proxies.

simplesect.para: total fitting error

memberdef.definition: std::size_t CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::add_to_furthest_proxies
memberdef.name: add_to_furthest_proxies

briefdescription.para: adds proxies to the worst regions one by one.

detaileddescription.para:
The re-fitting is performed after each proxy is inserted.
nb_proxies
number of proxies to be added
nb_iterations
number of re-fitting iterations
number of proxies added

memberdef.definition: std::size_t CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::add_proxies_error_diffusion
memberdef.name: add_proxies_error_diffusion

briefdescription.para: adds proxies by diffusing fitting error into current partition.

detaileddescription.para:
Each partition is added with the number of proxies in proportion to its fitting error.
nb_proxies
number of proxies to be added
number of proxies successfully added

memberdef.definition: std::size_t CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::teleport_proxies
memberdef.argsstring: (const std::size_t nb_proxies, const std::size_t nb_iterations=5, const bool no_threshold_test=false)
memberdef.name: teleport_proxies

briefdescription.para: teleports the local minimum to the worst region by combining the merging and adding processes.

detaileddescription.para:
The re-fitting is performed after each teleportation. Here if we specify more than one proxy this means we teleport in a naive iterative fashion.
nb_proxies
number of proxies requested to teleport.
nb_iterations
number of re-fitting iterations.
no_threshold_test
if true, no check on the approximation error before merging a pair of proxies is done. In other words, find_best_merge(!no_threshold_test) is called.
number of proxies teleported.

memberdef.definition: FT CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::merge
memberdef.name: merge

briefdescription.para: merges two specified adjacent regions.

detaileddescription.para:
The overall re-fitting is not performed and the proxy index map is maintained.
two proxies must be adjacent, and 0 <= px0 < px1 < proxies.size()
px0
the kept proxy index
px1
the merged and erased proxy index, proxies with greater indeies are decreased by 1 to fill the gap
change of error

memberdef.definition: std::optional< std::pair< std::size_t, std::size_t > > CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::find_best_merge
memberdef.name: find_best_merge

briefdescription.para: simulates merging and local re-fitting of all pairs of adjacent proxies and finds the best pair to merge.

simplesect.para: The best is defined as the minimum merged sum error change (increase or decrease) among all pairs.

parameterdescription.para: if true and a best pair of proxies is found, it is returned only if the error change after the merge is lower than the half of the maximum proxy error.

simplesect.para: if the best merge pair is found the optional returned contains the proxy indices, and is empty otherwise.

memberdef.definition: bool CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::split
memberdef.argsstring: (const std::size_t px_idx, const std::size_t n=2, const std::size_t nb_relaxations=10)
memberdef.name: split

briefdescription.para: splits within a specified proxy area via N-section (by default bisection), other regions are not affected.

parameterdescription.para: number of relaxations within the proxy area px_idx after the split

simplesect.para: true if split succeeds, and false otherwise.

memberdef.definition: bool CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::extract_mesh
memberdef.name: extract_mesh

briefdescription.para: extracts the output mesh in the form of an indexed triangle set.

parameterdescription.para: an optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

simplesect.para: true if the extracted surface mesh is manifold, and false otherwise.

listitem.para: the chord subdivision ratio threshold to the chord length or average edge length
the chord subdivision ratio threshold to the chord length or average edge length for boundary edges
If true, the subdivision_ratio is the ratio of the furthest vertex distance to the chord length, otherwise is the average edge length
If true, the subdivision_ratio is weighted by dihedral angle
If true, optimize the anchor locations
If true, optimize the anchor locations of boundary vertices
If true, use PCA plane fitting, otherwise use the default area averaged plane parameters

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::output
memberdef.name: output

briefdescription.para: outputs approximation results.

parameterdescription.para: an optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: a property map to output the proxy index of each face of the input polygon mesh
Type: a model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<TriangleMesh>::face_descriptor as key and std::size_t as value type
Default: no output operation is performed
Extra: A proxy is a set of connected faces which are placed under the same proxy patch (see fig__iterations)
Extra: The proxy-ids are contiguous in range [0, number_of_proxies - 1]
an OutputIterator to put proxies in
Type: a class model of OutputIterator with CGAL::Surface_mesh_approximation::L21_metric_vector_proxy_no_area_weighting::Proxy value type
Default: no output operation is performed
an OutputIterator to put anchor points in
Type: a class model of OutputIterator with geom_traits::Point_3 value type
Default: no output operation is performed
an OutputIterator to put indexed triangles in
Type: a class model of OutputIterator with std::array<std::size_t, 3> value type
Default: no output operation is performed

memberdef.name: number_of_proxies

memberdef.definition: std::size_t CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::init_random
memberdef.argsstring: (const std::size_t max_nb_proxies, const FT min_error_drop, const std::size_t nb_relaxations)
memberdef.name: init_random

briefdescription.para: randomly initializes proxies with both maximum number of proxies and minimum error drop stop criteria, where the first criterion met stops the seeding.

simplesect.para: To ensure the randomness, call std::srand() beforehand.

parameterdescription.para: maximum number of proxies, should be in range (nb_connected_components, nb_faces / 3)
minimum error drop, should be in range (0.0, 1.0), negative value is ignored

simplesect.para: number of proxies initialized

memberdef.definition: std::size_t CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::init_incremental
memberdef.argsstring: (const std::size_t max_nb_proxies, const FT min_error_drop, const std::size_t nb_relaxations)
memberdef.name: init_incremental

briefdescription.para: incrementally initializes proxies with both maximum number of proxies and minimum error drop stop criteria, The first criterion met stops the seeding.

parameterdescription.para: maximum number of proxies, should be in range (nb_connected_components, nb_faces / 3)
minimum error drop, should be in range (0.0, 1.0), negative value is ignored

simplesect.para: number of proxies initialized

memberdef.definition: std::size_t CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::init_hierarchical
memberdef.argsstring: (const std::size_t max_nb_proxies, const FT min_error_drop, const std::size_t nb_relaxations)
memberdef.name: init_hierarchical

briefdescription.para: hierarchically initializes proxies with both maximum number of proxies and minimum error drop stop criteria, where the first criterion met stops the seeding.

parameterdescription.para: maximum number of proxies, should be in range (nb_connected_components, nb_faces / 3)
minimum error drop, should be in range (0.0, 1.0), negative value is ignored

simplesect.para: number of proxies initialized

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::partition
memberdef.name: partition

briefdescription.para: partitions the area tagged with CGAL_VSA_INVALID_TAG with proxies, global face proxy map is updated.

detaileddescription.para:
Propagates the proxy seed faces and floods the tagged area to minimize the fitting error.
ProxyWrapperIterator
forward iterator with Proxy_wrapper as value type
beg
iterator point to the first element
end
iterator point to the one past the last element

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::fit
memberdef.argsstring: (const ProxyWrapperIterator beg, const ProxyWrapperIterator end, const CGAL::Sequential_tag &t)
memberdef.name: fit

briefdescription.para: refits and updates input range of proxies, sequential.

parameterdescription.para: forward iterator with Proxy_wrapper as value type
iterator point to the first element
iterator point to the one past the last element

memberdef.name: add_to_furthest_proxy

simplesect.para: true if add is successfully, and false otherwise

briefdescription.para: fits a new (wrapped) proxy from a region patch.

listitem.para: Compute proxy parameters from a list of faces.
Find proxy seed face.

Sum the proxy error.
FacePatch
container with face_descriptor as data type
px_patch
proxy patch container
px_idx
the assigned proxy index
fitted wrapped proxy

briefdescription.para: fits a new (wrapped) proxy from a face.

Update the proxy error.

current face proxy map is valid
f
face
px_idx

memberdef.definition: bool CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::random_pick_non_seed_faces
memberdef.name: random_pick_non_seed_faces

briefdescription.para: picks a number of non-seed faces into an empty vector randomly.

simplesect.para: true if the requested number of faces are selected, and false otherwise

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::bootstrap_from_connected_components
memberdef.name: bootstrap_from_connected_components

briefdescription.para: initializes proxies from each connected component of the input mesh.

simplesect.para: This function clears proxy vector and sets face proxy map to initial state, intended only for bootstrapping initialization. Coarse approximation iteration is not performed, because it is inaccurate anyway and may yield degenerate cases (e.g. a standard cube model).

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::compute_proxy_planes
memberdef.name: compute_proxy_planes

briefdescription.para: computes proxy planes.

detaileddescription.para:
The proxy may not contain the plane related properties, so we need these internal planes, used in the chord subdivision and anchor location.
if_pca_plane
set true to use the PCA plane fitting

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::find_anchors
memberdef.name: find_anchors

briefdescription.para: finds the anchors.

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::find_edges
memberdef.argsstring: (const FT subdivision_ratio, const FT boundary_subdivision_ratio, const bool relative_to_chord, const bool with_dihedral_angle)
memberdef.name: find_edges

briefdescription.para: finds and approximates the chord connecting the anchors.

parameterdescription.para: the chord subdivision ratio threshold to the chord length or average edge length for boundary edges
boundary chord approximation recursive split criterion
set true if the subdivision_ratio is relative to the chord length (relative sense), otherwise it's relative to the average edge length (absolute sense).
if set to true, add dihedral angle weight to the distance.

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::add_anchors
memberdef.name: add_anchors

briefdescription.para: adds anchors to the boundary cycles with only 2 anchors.

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::pseudo_cdt
memberdef.name: pseudo_cdt

briefdescription.para: runs the pseudo Constrained Delaunay Triangulation at each proxy region, and stores the extracted indexed triangles in tris.

simplesect.para: all anchors are found, i.e. all boundary cycles have been visited and attached with at least 3 anchors.

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::walk_to_first_anchor
memberdef.name: walk_to_first_anchor

briefdescription.para: walks along the region boundary cycle to the first halfedge pointing to a vertex associated with an anchor.

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::walk_to_next_anchor
memberdef.name: walk_to_next_anchor

briefdescription.para: walks along the region boundary cycle to the next anchor and records the path as a Boundary_chord.

parameterdescription.para: starting region boundary halfedge pointing to a vertex associated with an anchor

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::walk_to_next_border_halfedge
memberdef.name: walk_to_next_border_halfedge

briefdescription.para: walks to the next boundary cycle halfedge.

memberdef.definition: std::size_t CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::subdivide_chord
memberdef.argsstring: (const Boundary_chord_iterator &chord_begin, const Boundary_chord_iterator &chord_end, const FT subdivision_ratio, const FT boundary_subdivision_ratio, const bool relative_to_chord, const bool with_dihedral_angle)
memberdef.name: subdivide_chord

briefdescription.para: subdivides a chord recursively in range [chord_begin, chord_end).

parameterdescription.para: the chord recursive split error threshold
the chord subdivision ratio threshold to the chord length or average edge length for boundary edges
set true if the subdivision_ratio is relative to the chord length (relative sense), otherwise it is relative to the average edge length (absolute sense).
if set to true add dihedral angle weight to the distance.

simplesect.para: the number of anchors of the chord apart from the first one

memberdef.definition: bool CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::is_anchor_attached
memberdef.name: is_anchor_attached

briefdescription.para: tests if the target vertex of a halfedge is attached with an anchor.

simplesect.para: true is attached with an anchor, and false otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (const typename boost::property_traits< VertexAnchorIndexMap >::key_type vtx, const VertexAnchorIndexMap &vanchor_map) const
memberdef.name: is_anchor_attached

memberdef.definition: Plane_3 CGAL::Variational_shape_approximation< TriangleMesh, VertexPointMap, ErrorMetricProxy, GeomTraits, Concurrency_tag >::fit_plane_pca
memberdef.name: fit_plane_pca

simplesect.para: fitted plane

briefdescription.para: Main class for Variational Shape Approximation algorithm.

detaileddescription.para:
It is based on [1]. For simple use cases, the function CGAL::Surface_mesh_approximation::approximate_mesh() might be sufficient.
TriangleMesh
a model of FaceListGraph
VertexPointMap
a ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<TriangleMesh>::vertex_descriptor as key and GeomTraits::Point_3 as value type
ErrorMetricProxy
a model of ErrorMetricProxy
GeomTraits
a model of Kernel
Concurrency_tag
concurrency tag.
